title: UNESCO-Listed Heritage Mexico Stay in the Heart of Oaxaca
description:
Experience boutique luxury and old-world charm in the heart of Oaxaca with an enriching stay at the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Quinta Real Oaxaca. Housed in the expertly restored 16th-century Convent of Santa Catalina de Siena, this romantic property is within walking distance to the most sought-after central city attractions including the Basílica de Nuestra Señora de la Soledad, Templo de Santo Domingo, the Contemporary Art Museum, Zona Arqueológica de Monte Albán and endless noteworthy stores and restaurants.

Inside, you'll find the perfect fusion of Spanish Colonial-style architecture and modern elegance, from the famous frescoes and antique tiled floors to the manicured gardens, captivating courtyards and serene fountains. After a day of exploring the city, linger over traditional and contemporary Mexican cuisine at Refectorio Restaurant, or end the evening with handcrafted cocktails either poolside at Novicias Bar or overlooking the beautiful greenery at Bugambilias Bar.
